title: About Me
subtitle: Experienced full-stack developer with expertise in Golang, C#/.NET, and TypeScript. Specializing in scalable microservices architecture, efficient frontend development, and seamless API integrations.

softSkills.title: Interpersonal and Leadership Skills
softSkills.description: Strong collaboration, leadership, and time management skills, developed through experience in cross-functional teams. Effective communicator with proficiency in English (B2) and French (B1). Passionate about continuous learning and technological innovation.

hardSkills.title: Technical Expertise
hardSkills.description: Skilled in designing and implementing high-performance applications, optimizing system architecture, and enhancing user experience through modern frameworks and tools.
